summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated July 23, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and includes a record for an officer assigned to 'Suicide Watch' for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at the time.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Correctional officer listed on the roster with multiple shift assignments, including being assigned to 'Suicide Watch' from 01:30 to 08:00 on July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Correctional officer listed on the roster under 'Back Page Categories' with a status of 'SICK LEAVE'.

events.title: Suicide Watch Assignment
events.description: Correctional Officer Thomas, M is assigned to 'Suicide Watch' from 01:30 to 08:00.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is a staff roster for the MCC New York dated July 23, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
Officer Thomas, M is explicitly assigned to 'Suicide Watch' during the early morning hours (01:30-08:00) of July 23, 2019.
The roster shows a complex system of shift changes, leave (sick/annual), and post assignments for over 100 correctional services staff.

The document's metadata shows it was printed or saved on January 25, 2019, which is an anomaly as it references dates in July and August 2019; this may be a system timestamp for when the record was generated or accessed.
